mileage_logic_text.100000: The 'danger zone' for the 3.5L EcoBoost. If you hear a cold start rattle, it's likely Cam Phasers (,000+).
mileage_logic_text.150000: At 150k miles, the 10-speed transmission becomes volatile. Fluid flush is mandatory.
mileage_logic_text.200000: You are in 'Bonus Time'. Major failure exceeds vehicle value. Do not invest heavily.

mileage_logic_text.100000: AFM (Active Fuel Management) lifter failure risk begins. Listen for ticking noise at idle. Disabling AFM can prevent catastrophic failure.
mileage_logic_text.150000: The 6L80 transmission is the weak link. Expect torque converter shudder. Fluid flush with Mobil1 Synthetic LV ATF HP may extend life.
mileage_logic_text.200000: If the truck has survived this long without major issues, it's a keeper. Budget for suspension refresh.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Check for the 'Hemi Tick' (exhaust manifold bolt failure). If present, repair before it causes further damage.
mileage_logic_text.180000: TIPM (Totally Integrated Power Module) electrical issues become common. Sell if you see random electrical gremlins.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Air suspension (if equipped) is living on borrowed time. Budget ,500 for coil spring conversion.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Robust platform. Torque converter shudder may appear; fluid service () often fixes it.
mileage_logic_text.250000: Engine is fine, but suspension bushings are likely shot. Repair only if keeping for 3+ years.
mileage_logic_text.180000: Check water pump and alternator. Only these prevent it from reaching 300k miles.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Starter failure risk is high. If V6, install 'VCM Muzzler' to stop oil consumption.
mileage_logic_text.150000: CVT/Auto transmission is the limit. If shifting smooth, keep driving. If slipping, sell.
mileage_logic_text.200000: Exceptional longevity. Major repairs are rare if maintained.

mileage_logic_text.100000: You are now in the CVT danger zone. Any whining or hesitation means imminent failure.
mileage_logic_text.120000: CVT replacement cost (,200) often exceeds vehicle value. Sell before it fails.
mileage_logic_text.60000: CVT fluid service is MANDATORY. If skipped, transmission failure is almost guaranteed.

mileage_logic_text.100000: The 'JATCO Cliff'. CVT failure probability spikes >40%. A ,500 repair on a ,000 car is unwise.
mileage_logic_text.140000: Sell immediately if any whining noise appears. Residual value drops near scrap levels.
mileage_logic_text.60000: If CVT fluid wasn't changed at 30k/60k, the transmission is on borrowed time.

mileage_logic_text.100000: A/C condenser may leak. Extended warranty covers this if eligible. Verify VIN.
mileage_logic_text.150000: CVT fluid should be changed by now. If shifting is smooth, expect long life.
mileage_logic_text.60000: 1.5T engine oil dilution issue. Check if software update 18-137 was applied. Change oil more frequently.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Arguably the most reliable car in this mileage bracket. Just do spark plugs and coolant flush.
mileage_logic_text.250000: The transmission may whine slightly but will likely outlast your patience. Keep driving.
mileage_logic_text.180000: Check rear suspension bushings. Common wear item at this point.

mileage_logic_text.80000: VTC actuator 'grinding on cold start' is common. Annoying but not immediately dangerous. Will stretch timing chain over time.
mileage_logic_text.180000: Check all motor mounts. Vibration at idle often indicates worn mounts, not engine issues.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Starter motor failure is imminent if not already replaced. OEM Honda starter recommended.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Torque converter shudder may appear. Often fixed with transmission fluid change (). Don't ignore it.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Check water pump for pink residue. Replace proactively to avoid overheating.
mileage_logic_text.200000: Bulletproof platform. If maintained, expect another 100k miles. Only replace wear items.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Transmission shift flare is common. Software update helps but doesn't fully fix. Live with it or go manual.
mileage_logic_text.150000: INSPECT THE FRAME. Rust is the Tacoma killer, not mechanicals. If frame is solid, keep forever.
mileage_logic_text.250000: The 3.5L V6 is just getting broken in. These trucks regularly hit 300k+ with basic maintenance.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Water pump is the primary failure point. Replace proactively at 100k to avoid stranding.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Check sunroof drains for clogs. Water intrusion can cause expensive electrical damage.
mileage_logic_text.200000: Transmission is the limiting factor. If it shifts clean, this SUV has another 100k in it.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Death Wobble starts here. Replace track bar, ball joints, and steering stabilizer.
mileage_logic_text.180000: The 3.6L Pentastar is solid. Keep on Jeeping - these hold value exceptionally well.
mileage_logic_text.120000: TIPM (electrical module) failure causes random stalling. Common and expensive.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Quadra-Lift air suspension leaks common. Convert to coil springs (,500) rather than fixing (+).
mileage_logic_text.180000: TIPM electrical gremlins expected. Sell if electronics act up.
mileage_logic_text.140000: Pentastar 3.6L may develop 'Tick' (rocker arms). Listen carefully.

mileage_logic_text.100000: 6F35 transmission is the Achilles heel. If slipping occurs, repair cost often exceeds vehicle value.
mileage_logic_text.140000: If you've made it this far without major issues, you got lucky. Don't push your luck further.
mileage_logic_text.60000: 1.5L/1.6L EcoBoost engines have coolant intrusion risk. Watch for white smoke. Avoid if possible.

mileage_logic_text.80000: CRITICAL: Check oil for 'chocolate milk' appearance. Internal water pump failure destroys engine.
mileage_logic_text.120000: PTU (Power Transfer Unit) needs fluid change every 30k. If ignored, expect grinding and failure.
mileage_logic_text.160000: Transmission shudder is common. Flush with Mercon ULV may help, but plan for eventual rebuild.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Identical AFM lifter issue as Silverado. Consider AFM delete if rebuilding.
mileage_logic_text.150000: A/C condenser failure is common. Budget for replacement.
mileage_logic_text.200000: Transmission shudder fix: Use factory-approved friction modifier additive.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Exhaust manifold leak is common. Listen for ticking on cold start. Not urgent but annoying.
mileage_logic_text.250000: The 4.0L V6 is legendary for longevity. These regularly exceed 300k miles.
mileage_logic_text.180000: Air injection pump recall - verify VIN coverage. Check engine light may appear.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Check for daytime running light recall. LED failure is common but covered.
mileage_logic_text.180000: These engines easily reach 200k+ with proper care. Excellent long-term value.
mileage_logic_text.120000: SKYACTIV engine is remarkably reliable. Just do regular maintenance.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Check oil consumption. The FA series engines are known for burning oil between changes.
mileage_logic_text.150000: CVT extended warranty (100k miles) may have expired. Budget for potential replacement ().
mileage_logic_text.60000: CVT fluid change is MANDATORY. Skipping this leads to premature CVT failure.

mileage_logic_text.100000: FB20 engine oil consumption varies. Monitor oil level every 1000 miles.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Head gasket issues of older Subarus are mostly resolved, but check for coolant smell.
mileage_logic_text.60000: Same CVT as Outback. Fluid change is critical. Use only Subaru CVT fluid.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Dual-clutch (DCT) hesitation from stop is characteristic, not a defect. Software updates help.
mileage_logic_text.150000: If engine hasn't failed by now and you have service records, you're likely in the clear.
mileage_logic_text.60000: Theta II engine recall: Verify if your VIN was covered and if engine was replaced. Critical safety issue.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Oil starvation issue causes rod knock. Listen for metallic engine noise at startup.
mileage_logic_text.140000: If maintained properly and no engine issues, these are surprisingly reliable.
mileage_logic_text.60000: Same Theta II engine risk as Tucson. Check recall status immediately.

critical_milestones.description: Spark Plug Service (16 Plugs for V8)
